snippet: Peter V. Neffenger, the agency’s administrator, removed Kelly Hoggan as part of an overhaul after facing a backlash over lines at airports and management problems.
abstract: Transportation Security Administration head Peter V Neffenger dismisses agency's top security official Kelly Hoggan, who received $90,00 in bonuses despite complaints about major security line delays, breaches and mismanagement; critics say move insufficiently addresses problems and confidence in Neffenger is waning.
lead_paragraph: Peter V. Neffenger, the agency’s administrator, removed Kelly Hoggan as part of an overhaul after facing a backlash over lines at airports and management problems.

headline.main: T.S.A. Replaces Security Chief as Tension Grows at Airports and Agency
headline.print_headline: T.S.A. Replaces Top Security Official as Tension Grows at Airports and Agency
